QuestData.Title: Boar Training: Riplash
QuestData.Description: That boar's seen it's share of combat out in Gorgrond, so it'll be a bit easier to train. We'll start off in it's home, as you've done with yer other beasties.$B$BSee if the two of you can't take down the mighty raptor known as Riplash.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Riplash while riding your Boar-In-Training.
